>
[Kobold Weapon Innovator](/Feats.aspx?ID=2383) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 38 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Kobold Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2381)

</column>

---

You've learned devious tactics with your kobold weapons. Whenever you critically hit with a [crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67), [greatpick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=23), [light pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=30), [pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=34), [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10), or [kobold](/Traits.aspx?ID=224) weapon, you apply the weapon's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).
name: Kobold Weapon Innovator
